mapper.sql: id, valuation, transaction, createDate, name, typeId, status, attn, company, variety
mapper.select: SELECT p.*,s.name AS statusName,bu.name as attnName,e.organizationName AS companyName,pt.productTypeName AS varietyName, d.`id` AS d_id,d.`IDCard` AS d_idCard,d.`name` AS d_name FROM pledge p INNER JOIN pledgeStatus s ON s.id=p.status INNER JOIN extension e ON e.id=p.company INNER JOIN producttype pt ON pt.id=p.variety inner join backenduser bu on bu.id=p.attn INNER JOIN devuser d ON d.`id`=p.`duId` where p.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into pledge (valuation, transaction, createDate, name, typeName,duId, status, attn, company, variety) values (#{valuation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transaction,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{duId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{variety,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into pledge
id,
valuation,
transaction,
createDate,
name,
typeName,
status,
attn,
company,
variety,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{valuation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{transaction,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{attn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{company,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{variety,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update pledge
valuation = #{valuation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
transaction = #{transaction,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typeName = #{typeName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
attn = #{attn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company = #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER},
variety = #{variety,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pledge set valuation = #{valuation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transaction = #{transaction,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeName = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attn = #{attn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company = #{company,jdbcType=INTEGER}, variety = #{variety,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
